sections.title: Computer Science Fundamentals
sections.description: Start your journey here with the core concepts of computation, data structures, and algorithms that power all software.

resources.name: Harvard's CS50x
resources.description: The definitive introduction to computer science. Engaging, comprehensive, and free.

resources.name: Abdul Bari's Algorithms Playlist
resources.description: Legendary YouTube playlist that masterfully explains complex algorithms.

resources.name: GeeksforGeeks
resources.description: A vast library of articles and code examples for data structures and algorithms.

resources.name: freeCodeCamp - Data Structures Course
resources.description: A full 8-hour YouTube course covering everything you need for data structures.

sections.title: Web Development (Frontend)
sections.description: Learn to build beautiful and interactive user interfaces for websites and web applications.

resources.name: The Odin Project
resources.description: A complete, project-based curriculum for becoming a full-stack developer.

resources.name: MDN Web Docs
resources.description: The ultimate reference for all web technologies (HTML, CSS, JS).

resources.name: Kevin Powell's YouTube Channel
resources.description: A master of CSS. His tutorials make complex CSS simple and fun.

resources.name: Fireship.io
resources.description: Fast-paced, modern tutorials on JavaScript and popular frameworks.

sections.title: Web Development (Backend)
sections.description: Power your applications by learning how to work with servers, databases, and APIs.

resources.name: CodeWithHarry
resources.description: Excellent resource (Hindi/English) for Node.js, Python with Django, and databases.

resources.name: Traversy Media
resources.description: Countless project-based tutorials on Node.js, Express, and databases.

resources.name: PostgreSQL Exercises
resources.description: Practice your SQL skills with this interactive website.

sections.title: AI & Machine Learning
sections.description: Dive into the world of artificial intelligence, learning how to build models that can learn from data.

resources.name: Andrew Ng's ML Specialization
resources.description: The most famous and highly-recommended introductory course on the topic.

resources.name: Krish Naik's YouTube Channel
resources.description: Massive collection of playlists covering everything in ML, deep learning, and data science.

resources.name: Kaggle
resources.description: The best platform for practicing your ML skills with real-world datasets and competitions.

sections.title: Essential Tools & Practices
sections.description: Master the essential tools and workflows that every professional developer uses daily.

resources.name: Git - The Simple Guide
resources.description: A straightforward, no-nonsense guide to getting started with Git.

resources.name: GitHub Skills
resources.description: Fun, interactive courses to learn how to use GitHub effectively.

resources.name: Learn Command Line
resources.description: A free and simple introduction to the command line interface.

sections.title: Career Preparation
sections.description: Prepare for the job market with interview practice, resume tips, and portfolio guidance.

resources.name: LeetCode
resources.description: The premier platform for practicing coding interview questions.

resources.name: Gaurav Sen's System Design Playlist
resources.description: A fantastic resource for understanding how to design large-scale systems.
